intro: Share your perspectives on emotion recognition systems.
p: Share this site! Emotion recognition systems raise important questions that we all need to consider. We deserve a say in how–and if–this technology is used.

questions.text: Has your perspective on emotion recognition systems changed? Is it the technology or their practical applications?
Have you experienced emotion recognition systems, either directly or indirectly?
What aspects of emotion recognition systems do you find most interesting? Do you think they are useful or concerning? Why?
Can you imagine what the impacts of their uses might be?
